section_hero.title: John Lin
intros: I don't want this website to 'look impressive'.
I just want it to grow slowly, like me—into something I truly like.

contents: Currently, I'm a creator who values freedom—building things that matter to me through code.
These days, I'm learning English, writing reflections on education and life, and documenting everyday moments through photography.
I'm not sure what this site will become, but like me, it's always exploring, and never stopping.
